group_1.narration: News spread that the suspicious man@was caught in the Central Shopping Village.
But he hadn't been arrested for a crime.@He turned himself in for his own safety.
The man...or rather, the victim of@the Familiar, had no memory of what@he'd done under its influence.@He was found roaming around in a daze,@asking for help from anyone who drew near.
This shocking turn caused word to spread@as if it was some kind of horror story.@But it wasn't long before the whole @thing was forgotten.
However, that whole incident@was only the beginning.
The next thing happened when we were@just hanging out like normal.
The time we always spent together@turned into something else.

group_1.textRight: That guy... The one that was the source of@all that suspicious activity.
Turns out he was one of the residents!

group_1.textLeft: Seems that way. From Building 4, right?

group_1.textRight: Still, isn't it weird? He can't remember@squat!

group_1.textLeft: It's good they solved it, anyway.

group_1.textRight: It was turnin' into real horror story type@stuff.
It's nothing big. Just, something's been@kind of on my mind.
Yesterday, Mito and I went shopping together.
Yeah! After I went home, we ran into each@other by chance!

group_1.narration: I suddenly got a bad feeling right then.

group_1.textRight: When we were walking back we saw a@girl who looked just like you.

group_1.narration: But no one should've been around.@I made so sure no one was following me.
It must've been after everything was over?
What do I do? What should I say?!
All I can do is...lie to them.

group_1.textLeft: After we split up at the park? You saw me@near the shopping center?
No, I didn't go anywhere near there.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I knew it! Must've been a mistake.
Ah ha ha! Sorry about that!
